title: help finding an opentype alternative
content:
can anyone suggest a good open type alternative to pysops’s eidetic neo? thanks!

 [‹ Best Free Serif Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142614/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28474 "Go to previous forum topic") [BOOK ON QUANTUM PHYSICS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142614/http:/www.typophile.com/node/28327 "Go to next forum topic")
author: one8e

comments.content: PSY/OPS are very accommodating folks. Contact them and they can probably provide the format you need.
Psy/Ops are very close to have an OpenType version of Eidetic ready. Please contact Rodrigo Cavzos himself to get the details.
Actually its already out with Emigre... [http://www.emigre.com/ot.php?id=91](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142614/http:/www.emigre.com/ot.php?id=91 "http://www.emigre.com/ot.php?id=91")
